summary: Completed comprehensive re-testing of OpenClaw landing page - all functionality working perfectly including newly tested AI call endpoint. Backend APIs (7/7) and frontend UI flows (100%) all passing.
passed_tests: Backend API /api/health returns healthy status
Backend API /api/chat responds with AI-generated Czech text
Backend API /api/contact saves form to database and returns success
Backend API /api/callback saves callback request and returns success
Backend API /api/ai-call saves AI call request to database (NEW)
Backend API /api/chat/history retrieves chat messages
Backend API /api/ root endpoint responds correctly
Landing page loads correctly with all sections (navbar, hero, features, pricing, footer)
AI Chat widget opens, sends messages, and responds in Czech language
Contact form modal opens, accepts input, submits successfully with Czech success message
Callback modal opens with AI/Human selector functionality working correctly
AI call type selector works (default selection)
Human call type selector works (can switch between types)
Callback form submission works for both AI and human call types
Navigation links work (Funkce, Jak to funguje, Ceník sections)
Pricing cards buttons (Základ and Růst) open contact modal correctly
All hero CTA buttons functional (Chat, Callback, Meeting)
All footer CTA buttons functional (Chat, Callback, Meeting)
All modals close properly (auto-close after success, manual close buttons)
Form validation and error handling working correctly

success_percentage.backend: 100% (7/7 tests passed including new AI call endpoint)
success_percentage.frontend: 100% (all UI flows, modals, forms, and integrations working perfectly)
